content_html: Bagmati, Sept 18: The foot and mouth disease that had spread in the livestock raised by farmers in various local levels of Makawanpur, including Hetauda Sub-metropolitan City, has been brought under control. The disease has been brought under control after the Animal Services Office Makawanpur launched a vaccination

title: Foot and Mouth disease under control
